<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>2156</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Tangram</string>
            <string language="en">Tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τανγκράμ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tangram</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Tangram er et gammelt kinesisk puslespill med 7 brikker. Et kvadrat, fem trekanter og et parallellogram. Velg en figur og forsøk å dekke det grå feltet.</string>
            <string language="en">A tangram is an old chineese puzzle which consists of seven pieces .A square, five right-angle triangles and a paralellogram.Choose a figure and try to cover the grey area.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">puslespill</string>
            <string language="en">puzzle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">tangram</string>
            <string language="en">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein tangram ist ein altes chineese Puzzlespiel, 
das aus sieben Stücken A Quadrat besteht, fünf rechtwinklige 
Dreiecke und ein paralellogram.Choose eine Abbildung und ein Versuch, 
zum des grauen Bereiches zu umfassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un tangram est un vieux puzzle chineese qui se 
compose de sept morceaux de place d'A, cinq triangles à angle droit 
et un paralellogram.Choose une figure et un essai pour couvrir le 
domaine gris.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um tangram é um enigma chineese velho que 
consista em sete partes do quadrado do A, cinco triângulos 
right-angle e um paralellogram.Choose uma figura e uma tentativa para 
cobrir a área cinzenta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un tangram è un vecchio puzzle chineese che 
consiste di sette parti del quadrato del A, cinque triangoli ad angolo
retto e un paralellogram.Choose una figura e una prova per riguardare 
la zona grigia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα τανγκράμ είναι ένας παλαιός chineese γρίφος 
που αποτελείται από επτά κομμάτια. Τετράγωνο, πέντε 
right-angle τρίγωνα και ένα paralellogram. επιλέγουν έναν 
αριθμό και προσπαθούν να καλύψουν την γκρίζα περιοχή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un tangram es un viejo rompecabezas chineese que 
consiste en siete pedazos del cuadrado del A, cinco triángulos de 
ángulo recto y un paralellogram.Choose una figura y un intento para 
cubrir el área gris.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Puzzlespiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">puzzle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">enigma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">puzzle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γρίφος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τανγκράμ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rompecabezas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
